Title: Syria: Al-Sharaa says all weapons to come under 'state control'
Description: Sharaa said his interim government will not allow for weapons to be outside of state control, and emphasised on protecting minorities in his meeting with Fidan.

Title: Topsy-turvy world: Why 60 Minutes twisted the Lebanon pager attacks
Description: Dispatches from Beirut: CBS '60 Minutes' glorification of the Lebanon pager attacks shows the West's horrific double standards in its defence of Israeli crimes.

Title: A topsy-turvy world: How the West twisted the Lebanon pager attacks
Description: Dispatches from Beirut: The West's framing of the Lebanon pager attacks as 'ingenious' exposed the horrific double standards in its defence of Israeli violence.

Title: PKK official denies claims of Maher al-Assad in Iraq's Kurdistan
Description: The PKK denies any presence in Syria, urging an end to foreign intervention and warning of Turkey's military activities near Mosul.

Title: Israel kills 58 Palestinians across Gaza in 24 hours
Description: Israel's deadly strikes continue in the Gaza Strip, targeting the likes of Khan Younis, Gaza City, Rafah and Nuseirat.

Title: Israeli attacks kills scores in Nuseirat, Al-Mawasi 'safe zone'
Description: Israel continued to pound the Gaza Strip as war enters its 444th day, killing scores in the Nuseirat and Al-Mawasi camps where several have sought shelter.

Title: Iran does 'not have or need regional proxy forces': Khamenei
Description: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei called US comments on Iran losing a 'proxy war' in the region after Hamas and Hezbollah's military losses a 'mistake'.

Title: Women-only flight lands in Iranian holy city for first time
Description: Iran's Aseman Airlines operated a historic women-only flight to Mashhad, led by woman pilot Shahrzad Shams, to mark the anniversary of Fatima al-Zahra's birth.

Title: US strikes Houthi targets in Yemen, hours after Israel hit
Description: In addition to striking Houthi targets, US forces also shot down multiple drones and an anti-ship cruise missile over the Red Sea.

Title: US strikes Houthi targets in Yemen, hours after Israel targeted
Description: In addition to striking Houthi targets, US forces also shot down multiple drones and an anti-ship cruise missile over the Red Sea.

Title: Israeli forces raid Syrian city in Quneitra amid incursions
Description: Israeli forces have advanced into Syria's Quneitra and Daraa provinces, carrying out violent raid under the pretext of 'searching for weapons'.

Title: Israeli forces set up outposts in Syria's Quneitra and Daraa
Description: Israeli forces established outposts and conducted raids in Syria's Quneitra and Daraa, displacing residents and restricting agricultural activities.

Title: Israel's Gaza war tied to rising Islamophobia in Europe: report
Description: The European Islamophobia Report 2023 found that Israel's ongoing war on Gaza has functioned as a 'geopolitical catalyst of anti-Muslim racism in Europe'.

Title: Lebanon Druze leader Walid Jumblatt meets HTS chief in Damascus
Description: Syria's de facto ruler Ahmed al-Sharaa hosted Lebanese Druze leader Walid Jumblatt on Sunday in another effort to reassure minorities they will be protected.

Title: Turkey FM Fidan meets HTS leader Al-Sharaa in Damscus
Description: Fidan and Al-Sharaa's meeting comes as Turkey said it would offer to help Syria in forming a state structure and drafting a new constitution if necessary.

Title: Pope again condemns 'cruelty' of Israeli strikes on Gaza
Description: Pope Francis condemned for a second time Israel's attacks on the Gaza Strip, despite criticism from the Israeli government.

Title: Shab-e Yalda sees growing recognition across US
Description: Shab-e Yalda, the ancient Persian winter solstice festival, is gaining recognition in the US with public celebrations and official statements.

Title: PA intensifies crackdown on Palestinian fighters in West Bank
Description: The Palestinian Authority has launched its largest and most heavily armed operation in its three decades to thwart Palestinian fighters in Jenin.

Title: Israel attacks Kamal Adwan Hospital, imposes evacuation order
Description: The Kamal Adwan Hospital has been the site of several Israeli attacks in recent hours as the army continues its military operation in north Gaza.

Title: Saudi warned Germany for years about Magdeburg attack suspect
Description: Saudi officials reportedly warned Berlin three times of the suspect and requested extradition, which was denied amid safety concerns.

Title: Israel kills 28 Palestinians, orders evacuation of Kamal Adwan
Description: Israeli violence has killed at least 28 Palestinians overnight and throughout Sunday morning, while attacks have intensified on Kamal Adwan Hospital.

Title: Israel army attacks Kamal Adwan Hospital, orders evacuation
Description: Israel ahs ordered the evacuation of staff members and patients from the Kamal Adwan Hospital, where it has increased its attacks in recent days.

Title: Israel slams Pope Francis for decrying bombing of Gaza children
Description: Pope Francis condemned the bombing of children in Gaza as 'cruelty', sparking criticism from Israel.
